name: God-King
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Food, +1 Science, +1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Gold] from every [Palace]

name: Goddess of Love
uniques: [+1 Happiness] [in cities following this religion] <in cities with at least [3] [Population]>

name: Sacred Waters
uniques: [+1 Happiness, +1 Food] in cities on [River] tiles

name: Monument to the Gods
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [World] wonders [in cities following this religion]

name: Messenger of the Gods
uniques: [+2 Science, +1 Culture] from each Trade Route

name: God of War
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in cities following this religion]

name: Goddess of Protection
uniques: [+1 Culture] [in all cities with a garrison]

name: Religious Settlements
uniques: [-50]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in cities following this religion]

name: Choral Music
uniques: [+3 Culture] from every [Temple] <in cities with at least [3] [Followers of this Religion]>

name: Cathedrals
uniques: May buy [Cathedral] buildings with [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

name: Guruship
uniques: [+2 Production, +2 Food] [in cities following this religion] <in cities with at least [1] [Specialists]>

name: Holy Warriors
uniques: May buy [{Military} {Land}] units with [Faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost

name: Mosques
uniques: May buy [Mosque] buildings with [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

name: Monasteries
uniques: May buy [Monastery] buildings for [150] [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

name: Pagodas
uniques: May buy [Pagoda] buildings with [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

name: Yongle
uniques: [+1] Happiness from each type of luxury resource

name: Worship
uniques: [+2 Culture, +2 Faith] [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Ceremonial Burial
uniques: [+1 Happiness] for each global city following this religion

name: Church Property
uniques: [+2 Gold] for each global city following this religion

name: Initiation Rites
uniques: [+200 Gold] when a city adopts this religion for the first time <(modified by game speed)>

name: Interfaith Dialogue
uniques: When spreading religion to a city, gain [20] times the amount of followers of other religions as [Science]

name: Papal Primacy
uniques: Resting point for Influence with City-States following this religion [+60]

name: Peace Loving
uniques: [+1 Happiness] from every [5] global followers [in non-enemy foreign cities]

name: Pilgrimage
uniques: [+3 Faith] for each global city following this religion

name: Tithe
uniques: [+1 Gold] from every [3] global followers [in all cities]

name: World Church
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [4] global followers [in all cities]

name: Defender of the Faith
uniques: [+20]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: Just War
uniques: [+20]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>

name: Messiah
uniques: [-25]% Faith cost of generating Great Prophet equivalents

name: Sacred Sites
uniques: [+2 Science, +2 Culture, +2 Faith, +2 Gold] from every [Great Improvement]

name: Monumentality
uniques: Comment [The production cost of National Wonders does not increase with the number of cities]

name: Devout Palmer
uniques: [Faith] cost of purchasing items in cities [-20]%

name: Itinerant Preachers
uniques: Religion naturally spreads to cities [+4] tiles away

name: Missionary Zeal
uniques: [+50 Faith] when a city adopts this religion for the first time <(modified by game speed)>

name: Religious Unity
uniques: [+15]% Strength <for [Military] units> <when adjacent to a [Religious Unit] unit>

name: Reliquary
uniques: Gain [200] [Faith] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>

name: Jesuit Education
uniques: May buy [Library] buildings for [100] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>
May buy [University] buildings for [200] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>
May buy [Observatory] buildings for [300] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>
May buy [Public School] buildings for [400] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>
May buy [Research Lab] buildings for [500] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>

name: To the Glory of God
uniques: May buy [Great Person] units for [1000] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion] at an increasing price ([500]) <starting from the [Renaissance era]>

name: Underground Sect
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Food, +1 Science, +1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Gold] [in cities following our religion]

name: Work Ethic
uniques: May buy [Workshop] buildings for [200] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>
May buy [Windmill] buildings for [300] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>
May buy [Factory] buildings for [400] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>
May buy [Hydro Plant] buildings for [450] [Faith] [in cities following our religion] <(modified by game speed)>

name: Meditation
uniques: Free Technology <upon entering a new era> <after discovering [Construction]>

name: Religious Troubadours
uniques: Comment [Allows Lighthouses to establish trade routes via sea routes]
[+3 Production, +3 Food, +3 Science] from each Trade Route <in [Coastal] cities>
